name: The King Command
description:
Unfinished game for 2 GameJam that are happening at the same time first submission for GrapeFruit GameJam 2 missing time to work on it so i have to post an unfinished build. 

The concept although not working since isn't finished is that the player incarnate the king that order his troop in a war tent. You don't have visual on your unit and enemy unit. You can place icon on the map to refer at position of where you think the unit are. You can send scout to give information such as unit position on the map, unit status (health, damage, attack range, etc), unit sight if they spotted enemy movement. And you can send order for unit to move. You have to place icon on the map yourself to keep track and win the war without letting enemy reach your tent.
